title: When will Sinner, Alcaraz & Djokovic play at Wimbledon?
description: The 2025 edition of The Championships at Wimbledon will begin Monday, with the world's best players chasing the title at the grass-court Grand Slam tournament. When Will Jannik Sinner, Carlos Alcaraz and Novak Djokovic play their first-round matches? Sinner, the No. 1 player in the PIF ATP Rankings, will face fellow Italian Luca Nardi in his opening match at SW19 on Tuesday. The pair's first Lexus ATP Head2Head meeting will be at a time still to be confirmed. Djokovic, a seven-time Wimbledon champion, will also begin his event on Tuesday. The Serbian, seeded sixth, will take on Frenchman Alexander Muller. As is customary, two-time defending champion Alcaraz will open Centre Court Monday when he plays former Top-10 star Fabio Fognini. The Spaniard has won 18 consecutive matches and will try to extend that streak against the Italian. Click here to view the entire Monday order of play. [NEWSLETTER FORM]

html:
Tournament News

View full Monday order of play

June 29, 2025

Ezra Shaw/Getty Images

Jannik Sinner is pursuing his first Wimbledon title. By ATP Staff

The 2025 edition of The Championships at Wimbledon will begin Monday, with the world's best players chasing the title at the grass-court Grand Slam tournament. When Will Jannik Sinner, Carlos Alcaraz and Novak Djokovic play their first-round matches?

Sinner, the No. 1 player in the PIF ATP Rankings, will face fellow Italian Luca Nardi in his opening match at SW19 on Tuesday. The pair's first Lexus ATP Head2Head meeting will be at a time still to be confirmed.

Djokovic, a seven-time Wimbledon champion, will also begin his event on Tuesday. The Serbian, seeded sixth, will take on Frenchman Alexander Muller.

As is customary, two-time defending champion Alcaraz will open Centre Court Monday when he plays former Top-10 star Fabio Fognini. The Spaniard has won 18 consecutive matches and will try to extend that streak against the Italian.

Click here to view the entire Monday order of play.
